name: Issue 2
description:
We currently are out of stock here but there are copies left at -  http://www.newsstand.co.uk/justified

52 page perfect bound
(New Format) 170 x 240mm
Cover:- 300gsm Offset uncoated FSC Mixed Sources 
Text:- 150gsm Offset uncoated Mixed Sources
4 colour process and sealed throughout.

Our second issue offers an invitation into the studio of Two Times Elliott, as well as words from Mat Dolphin. Coupled with this is a selection of some of the most influential imagery that is helping to shape our expanding visual culture.


Editor: Joshua Ogden
Sub Editors: William Whiting and Jasper Van Den Bosch
Assisting Editor: Jack Swords
Art Direction & Publishing: Justified
Cover: Sophie Tajan
Editorial: Alex Cook
Featured Article: Mat Dolphin
Paper: Provided by Antalis 
Printing: Cambrian Printers

name: Alexander Jesipow Print
description:
Free UK shipping!

A limited run of 25 Risograph prints printed on paper from Antails. This print has been framed (see other photo below), if you would like it with the frame then please get in contact.

Artist: Alexander Jesipow

For Justified No.2

name: Justified Print
description:
Free UK shipping!

A limited run of 25 Risograph prints printed on paper from Antails.

name: Issue 1
description:
A4 self cover
4 colour throughout
90gsm news print paper 
Folded, stitched and trimmed. 

No1 is our introductory Issue, a paper extension from our Blog. This Issue shows an insight into how we intend to showcase creatives across the disciplines of art and design as well as related editorial provided by design agencies.

Editor/Designer: Joshua Ogden
Sub Editors: William Whiting, Jasper Van Den Bosch
Publishing/Art Direction: Justified
Printing: The Print Room (Bournemouth) Ltd
Editorial: Mat Dolphin
Cover: James Ward
